title: Ebola Closes The Doors Of One Of Liberia's Oldest Hospitals
teaser: A Spanish priest who was infected with the Ebola virus in Liberia has died at a hospital in Madrid. The Liberian hospital that Father Miguel Pajares had been working at in Monrovia is now shut down, because so many staff members have been infected with Ebola.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
